string.name: help_menu
string.br: Instructions: Enter your desired stop number, and click Go. This will return a list of busses that service your stop. Click one of them to see when details about that bus. Alternatively, you could click Add to Favorites, which will add that stop into your favorites list, so it is easily accessible.

resources.string: Author: Yahya Wardere This is a RSS Feed News app getting the News from the cbc website. You can Read the head lines and Save the articles or Visit the news links Activity version: 1.0
CBC Reader app created by Yahya Wardere
OC Transpo app created by Jerome Samuel
